name: VMware Fusion Virtual Machine
summary: A VMWAREVM file is a virtual machine (VM) created by VMware Fusion, a virtualization application for Macs that can run other operating systems. It stores all of the information for a virtual machine, including configuration files ( .VMX ) and virtual machine disks ( .VMDK ), required by Fusion to load and run an operating system .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: VMWAREVM file open in VMware Fusion 13
